mapper.select: SELECT p.parents_id AS pk, p.uid AS id, p.nm AS name, c.class_id AS grade, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM parents p LEFT JOIN student s ON p.parents_id = s.parents_id LEFT JOIN student_classes sc ON s.stu_id = sc.stu_id LEFT JOIN class c ON sc.class_id = c.class_id WHERE p.acept = 2 ORDER BY p.created_at
SELECT t.tea_id AS pk, t.uid AS id, t.nm AS name, c.class_id AS grade, t.created_at AS createdAt FROM teacher t LEFT JOIN class c ON c.tea_id = t.tea_id WHERE t.acept = 2 ORDER BY t.created_at
